Text: Despoina:  Pausanias spoke of Demeter as having two daughters; Kore being born first, then later Despoina.
Triplets:<Despoina
4:
--------------------
Text: Despoina:  With Zeus being the father of Kore, and Poseidon as the father of Despoina.
Triplets:<Despoina
5:
--------------------
Text: Despoina:  Pausanias made it clear that Kore is Persephone, though he wouldn't reveal Despoina's proper name.
